author: pderop
msg: Modified the TestBase class, which is now providing a getDM() method which can be called by subclasses when
needing to instantiate a Dependency Manager. Tests supporting parallelism can then call the setParallel(true)
method, and the getDM() method will then set a thread pool in the returned DM.
So, An exesting synchronous test can be played in parallel by just subclassing it and calling the setParallel(true) method.
Notice that currently, not all tests can be played in parallel (only tests ending with an "Ensure.waitForStep()" call can be
